summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York providing a small update on the Epstein investigation, confirming meetings for September 10, 2019, in Palm Beach, including a 'reverse proffer' session.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email providing an update on the investigation, confirming meetings in Palm Beach for September 10, 2019.

events.title: Scheduled Meetings in Palm Beach
events.description: Confirmed meetings in Palm Beach, including a reverse proffer session, as part of the investigation.

keyFacts: The email is dated September 5, 2019, and discusses an update in the Epstein investigation.
Meetings were confirmed for September 10, 2019, in Palm Beach, including a 'reverse proffer' session.
The author is an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The document indicates ongoing investigative activity in the case at that time.
